summary: P1 Features Testing Complete - All APIs working, UI verified. GPS shows 15 sessions with date filter, Wellness shows QTR=66 GOOD with Declining trend, Strength Analysis detects peripheral fatigue (RSI -21.1%, Peak Power -17.5% from peak), StrengthHistoryChart shows evolution with 12 assessments.

issues: Console warnings about deprecated 'shadow*' style props - should use 'boxShadow'

critical_code_review_comments: i18n audit complete - charts.tsx uses dynamic labels based on locale (pt/en)
StrengthHistoryChart component properly shows 'No assessment history' when <2 assessments
Peripheral fatigue detection working: triggers when RSI drop >10% AND power drop >10%
QTR score calculation using weighted formula from wellness parameters
seed_data_creation: Main agent created: 15 GPS sessions, 25 wellness questionnaires, 12 strength assessments
context_for_next_testing_agent: P1 features verified working: 1) GPS tab shows 15 sessions with working date filter (All/7days/30days/This month/Custom), 2) Wellness tab shows QTR gauge score=66 (GOOD) with Declining trend and Parameter Evolution chart, 3) Assessments tab shows Strength Analysis with peripheral fatigue detection, metrics comparison bars, AI insights, and StrengthHistoryChart showing 12 assessments evolution. Backend APIs all return expected data with proper i18n translations.
